channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Chinese espionage campaign scooped up data on thousands of US mobile users: Sources
item.description: A Chinese espionage campaign scooped up data on hundreds of thousands of American mobile phone users, likely stealing information about more than 1 mi...

item.title: South Korean leader faces likely impeachment over martial law order
item.description: South Korea is reeling over a shock martial law declaration by President Yoon Suk Yeol, whose short-lived gamble will have major implications.

item.title: British indie-rock band Sports Team robbed at gunpoint in Vallejo, California
item.description: A touring British indie-rock band said they lost personal gear when armed robbery targeted their van while they were getting coffee at a Vallejo Starb...

item.title: Kash Patel, Trump's pick to lead FBI, hit with Iranian cyberattack, sources say
item.description: The FBI director nominee Kash Patel was hit with what is believed to be a cyberattack emanating from Iran, according to two sources familiar with the ...

item.title: Trump's plan for Ukraine comes into focus: Territorial concessions but NATO off the table
Trump considers replacing Hegseth with DeSantis to run Pentagon, WSJ reports
Mom diagnosed with Stage 4 colon cancer at 38 recalls her 1st symptom: ‘I ignored it’

item.title: Thousands of Kurds displaced from Aleppo arrive in Kurdish-controlled areas near Raqqa
Police illegally sell restricted weapons supplying crime
item.description: These high-powered weapons are only meant for police. How are they ending up in criminals' hands?

item.title: Democrats flip seat in California's Central Valley in nation's final outstanding House race
Trump's controversial Cabinet picks raise questions about lower ethical standards
item.description: The former president has shown he has no qualms about putting his most loyal confidants in his administration, no matter their baggage.

item.title: Trump's DEA selection Chad Chronister withdraws from consideration
item.description: Florida sheriff Chad Chronister announced Tuesday he was withdrawing his name from consideration to run the Drug Enforcement Agency.

item.title: 12/3: CBS Evening News
item.description: Pete Hegseth, Trump's pick for defense secretary, on shaky ground; Colorado deputies hailed as heroes for fiery home rescue

item.title: Suspect in notorious cold case murders to appear in court
item.description: "It was an absolutely gruesome, horrific, frenzied homicide," police said after Perry Kouroumblis was arrested.
